author: mariohavel
content: And one more new project idea: https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/blob/master/projects/project-ideas.md#optimism-sequencer-support-for-erc-4337-bundlers

author: ctrl_alt_lulz
content: <@686695036733227017> i'm not in the official EF fellowship, but I'm highly interested in taking on the Stakers' testnet project, and would be able to implement it fairly quickly, eg end-to-end done within 1-3 months. since i'm nearly done with setting up automated validator depositing and have bls key gen, sign/verify, merklizer, and have chain snapshot downloading & jwt token injection middleware already on my open source github page

author: mariohavel
content: Wow thank you so much for reaching out! There is a lot of details to figure out and discuss before the real implementation work begins, we are now running the first test network to find potential issues with ephemeral setup. I will share a group where we discuss the current work

author: ctrl_alt_lulz
content: Awesome! Looking forward to chatting in the working group!
